name: Frozen Music Bot
description: ❄️ Frozen Music — Free Telegram VC music bot that runs on Render, Koyeb, Railway & Heroku easily!

ASSISTANT_SESSION.description: Pyrogram string session for assistant account

MongoDB_url.description: MongoDB URL (can use Atlas or local Mongo)

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Telegram channel link for bot updates (default: vibeshiftbots)

START_ANIMATION.description: URL of the animation/video to show on /start command
